website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a sturdy ceramic vase that's a little out of the ordinary and works with modern decor, this striking piece is likely to impress you.
pros: Distances itself from competitors with its matte black finish that has an edgy, modern appeal
Arrives in a pretty package that's ready to give as gift
cons: Some vases arrived with furniture protector pads on the bottoms, but not all of them had this feature

customer_reviews.title: Cutest simple elegant vase
customer_reviews.text: This size is hard to find!! I put my hand in the picture for scale. I measured the size I wanted for the end of my dresser, I also wanted something modern. This vase came packaged so cute I’m going to re- gift the box! I love this vase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Elegant and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I received the vase in perfect condition. It was packed well in a cute box. The vase is very elegant, simple and striking. I will be purchasing more of these soon. My daughter is getting married soon and for the price you could not ask for a better vessel for flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Tatia C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase.
customer_reviews.text: Love my vase and love the finish. It is matte. Look very classy but it was inexpensive. So sorry I broke it a few weeks ago but I glued it back together because they were sold out.
customer_reviews.author: YCumbess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I really love it... perfect size and color. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DARBETT JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vase for our occasion
customer_reviews.text: The vase was the perfect size. This was a gift to the coach, it held a beautiful floral arrangement and all the athletes wrote their names on the vase with permanent markers. It made a wonderful personalized gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife along with some red roses. I trimmed the roses, placed it in this vase and she seemed to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The vase arrived safely packed with no damage! It is a beautiful ceramic vase and we love it! It will be part of gift. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cris West

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. It came in a cute box and was securely wrapped in the box. It’s a thicker vase and looks nice! It’s a bit more than I wanted to spend for a vase, but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Uelmen

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: its super cute and I got it for myself to put on top of my side table and put fake flowers in it. Its modern and minimalists dream
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple white vase
customer_reviews.text: Love this simple vase. It’s perfect with the 5 artificial cotton stems also found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the vase! Box was very pretty, I'm going to use it for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I bought this for the LED willow branches that light up. Perfect together cute bedside light.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my window sill! I wanted something small enough to fit but not so tiny that it was minuscule. It also was packaged in the cutest box that I will reuse for gifting later on!:)) I’m also happy that there was little waste with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Simple Matte Vase
customer_reviews.text: Great size for weekly flowers from the grocery store. Looks clean and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissysoclassic

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging/ gift box. Well padded and protected yet beautifully packaged. Vase is nice and sturdy and nary a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table vase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Just what I was looking for. Has a good weight to it too
customer_reviews.author: B.w.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pampas grass! I got the taller one and it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nathali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This vase is so beautiful and sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Simple ceramic vase
customer_reviews.text: Style and price make this just right. Exactly what I was looking for. Will put in my guest bathroom with silk irises in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: It looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and texture! Looks like it's from an expensive store!
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Z. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant looking and comparable to my favorite PB store.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very high end looking
customer_reviews.text: Very high end looking. Similar go for 50 bucks in a high end shop. Definitely value for money. Even bought more!!
customer_reviews.author: Colby Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, simple vase. Black is perfect in my home. I might buy a matching one!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an opaque vase that won't show unsightly stems. This vase is nice and simple (not too ornate or busy) and just what I wanted. It is really beautiful and well made. It arrived quickly and in a surprisingly cute box that I will re-use :) I am super happy with it and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: nicole menard

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up intact but the two I ordered were inconsistent. One had three rubber pads for furniture protection, the other did not. One had manufacturers label on underside, the other did not. These inconsistencies made me doubt quality control and overall quality. Returned both :(
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Painted it with acrylic paints.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice vase to paint and give as a gift. It has a soft finish that is lovely as is, but also takes paint well. The gift box makes it simple to give.
customer_reviews.author: CNM

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This vase is great. It gies well with my decor. Thank you 😊 Kathy very much for helping make my order complete.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Tall Matte White Ceramic Vase
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this vase. The vase has a smooth surface and we like the height.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and durable. My cat keeps knocking it over and it doesn’t even chip.
customer_reviews.author: shayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely design. Great weight. Arrived in very pretty box. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mgkme

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Vase is beautiful and was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great color and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was sturdy and I love the matte finish!! Definitely would buy products from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Felt covered bottom
customer_reviews.text: For use in my office the felt covered bottom was nice so it does not scratch furniture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So attractive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for Mother’s Day today. It came nicely and safely packaged. I took it out right away bc I’m giving it to her with flowers in it. The design is simple, yet elegant. It’s a nice addition in any room. It seems sturdy, however, I’m not a fan of the padding on the bottom. Three little circle shaped adhesives are placed on the bottom but I think I’ll take them off. One of them is a tad lopsided and that’ll make the vase seem crooked. Minor detail but it matters in presentation. Otherwise, this is a wonderful gift for Mother’s Day and for anyone who enjoys fresh cut flowers in their home!
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture and came in a really nice box that I was able to use as a gift box later!
customer_reviews.author: Karsen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Vase, Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty vase. Nice and sturdy, holds a good amount of flowers. It came in a lovely gift box and I will def consider this as a gift option over Christmas etc. It’s more of a bone white than a pure white.
customer_reviews.author: Clare S

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful vase for cut flowers. My sunflowers, zinnias, cosmos, and roses all look great in this vase. It allows the flowers to be the star and provide the perfect support.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly S.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for these vases when I ordered them, but they turned out to be really nice. Highly recommend as great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Set it on a shelf and it was the best size, shape. Nicely made, good buy
customer_reviews.author: jwhughes56

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Came in such cute packaging! Would make a great gift. I use it for eucalyptus trimmings and it looks so cute. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Good looking simple elegant vase exactly what I wanted for my water bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Whyman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what they looked like on line
customer_reviews.text: I just received these vases and they all came in perfect condition. Having a black and white wedding shower for my daughter and I bought these for the bridesmaids as gifts and will put a few flowers in them by their plate setting. They are very chic and classy looking in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Description is very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Used as decoration with dried plants. I like that I can also use them for real flowers. A very nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and elegant, not too big but it was big enough for my flowers
customer_reviews.author: Bozena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This vase is beautiful and can go in any room.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie Polykov

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my mantle. Simple and so pretty. Packaged perfectly for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: browneyedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the photo, sleek and stylish. Packaged really well, arrived in great shape and on time! Very pleased with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

product_meta.title: Ceramic Flower Vase for Home Décor, Design Box Package, 8 Inch, Matte Black
product_meta.description:
Size:8 Inch| Color:Matte BlackD’vine Dev 8 Inch Matte Black Ceramic Flower Vase for Home Décor with Gift Box Packaged 

Size: 8 Inch / 11 Inch 
Color: Matte White / Matte Black 
Material: 100% High Quality Porcelain/Ceramics from quality origin. 

Simple and elegant appearance, oval shape, matte black finishing, with fresh and flourishing bouquet will be dress up as an awesome scene. 

We intimately prepare a gift box for you, this is ideal choices for gifts in birthday, wedding, party, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day or special occasions. The gift box is included without additional charges. 

In order to have a good shopping experience for you, we provide full refunds or hassle-free replacement if there is any issue with our products. If you have any questions or any suggestions, please contact me immediately, we will deal with as soon as possible.
feature_bullets: Handcraft with Simple Design - Classic design with matte black glazed finishing, made of high quality ceramic by handmade, it will perfect to decorate your space and add modern flavor.
Size and Color - There are 2 size and 2 color options. 8 Inch: 8” Height; 2 and 1/2 inches Open width / 11 Inch: 11” Height; 3” Open width. Color: Matte White & Matte Black.
Gift Box Package - This vase is packaged by gift box, it is an ideal gift for your family and friends in birthday, wedding, Mother’s Day, Valentine's Day etc.
Excellent Decoration - It is ideal for both fresh bouquets, greenery silk flowers, or floral arrangement. And suitable for home décor, kitchen, bathroom, office, wedding centerpiece

Love It or Full Refund - With confidence in D'vine Dev products, we provide full refunds or hassle-free replacement if there is any issue with our products. Please contact me if you have any questions.
